amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the U.S. Code regarding benefits for homeless veterans in training and outreach programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs in contravention of subchapter III of chapter 20 of title 38, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
